divs: Sighting DetailsHeading south on Bakerview road aprox 5:30 PM saw a flash with a long tail moving across most of sky in 3-4 seconds. Very clear evening, not a plane or like any shooting star I have seen, much brighter and lower than a satellite. The duration and speed of movement caught my eye and made me really hold my breath, it was unlike anything ive ever seen and moved east to west as I drove south.
Summary: Streak accross 2/3 rds of sky very fast, covering a great distance in 3-4 seconds.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bellingham
There were no other sightings in Bellingham on or around November 13th 2008
